docker.note: Requires Docker daemon running. Start with: sudo systemctl start docker

nanana.note: Requires NANANA_API_TOKEN from nanana.app. Visit https://nanana.app to get your API token

imagen3.note: Google Imagen 3.0 image generation using Gemini API. Binary installed at /home/ob/bin/imagen3-mcp

augments.note: Framework documentation server for React and Next.js. Provides real-time access to framework docs via MCP. Local repo at /home/ob/Development/Tools/mcps/augments-mcp-server

neon.note: Neon database management server with 30+ tools for project/branch management, SQL execution, migrations, and performance tuning

vertex-ai.note: Vertex AI MCP server with advanced coding assistance, filesystem operations, and query answering. Running from local installation with Vertex AI provider.

github.note: GitHub's official MCP server with 260+ tools for repository management, issues, pull requests, code review, and more. Requires GitHub Personal Access Token.

notion.note: Official Notion MCP server for page management, database operations, comments, and content access. Requires Notion integration token.

memory.note: Official MCP Memory server for persistent knowledge graphs. Stores entities, relations, and observations across sessions for cross-chat memory.

time.note: Official MCP Time server for timezone-aware time operations. Get current time in any timezone and convert between timezones using IANA timezone names.

sequential-thinking.note: Official MCP Sequential Thinking server for structured problem-solving. Enables dynamic and reflective thinking with thought revision and branching capabilities.

fetch.note: Official MCP Fetch server for web content retrieval. Fetches URLs and converts HTML to markdown. Supports chunked reading with start_index.

git.note: Official MCP Git server for repository operations. Provides tools for git status, diff, commit, branch management, and more.

prometheus.note: Prometheus MCP server for metrics querying and analysis. Execute PromQL queries, list metrics, and analyze monitoring data. Add PROMETHEUS_URL to .env file to enable (e.g., http://localhost:9090)

pinecone.note: Pinecone Developer MCP server for vector database operations. Search docs, manage indexes, upsert/search records, and configure integrated inference models.

redis.note: Official Redis MCP server for natural language Redis operations. Manage and search data in Redis with AI-driven workflows. Configured for localhost:6379 by default.

terraform.note: Official HashiCorp Terraform MCP Server for Infrastructure as Code automation with Terraform Cloud integration.

vercel.note: Official Vercel MCP Server for deployment and project management via streamable-http. Requires VERCEL_TOKEN in .env. Get token from Vercel Settings > Tokens at https://vercel.com/account/tokens

grafana.note: Official Grafana MCP Server for monitoring, observability, and analytics. Configured with GRAFANA_URL and GRAFANA_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN from .env

hf-transformers.note: Hugging Face MCP Server via streamable-http. OAuth flow will open browser when needed. Supports model inference, datasets, and more.

playwright.note: Microsoft Playwright MCP server for browser automation. Provides 40+ tools for web page interaction, screenshots, PDF generation, form filling, and E2E testing. Automatically installs browsers when needed.
